metadata.title: CVE-2020-17482 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server before 4.3.1 wherean authorized user with the ability to insert crafted records into a zonemight be able to leak the content of uninitialized memory.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
